welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Merion, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. Get ready to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta, Frontier, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Southwest, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Alaska, American, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by Aer Lingus, Air Canada, British Airways, Icelandair, Lufthansa, Qatar Airways, and other international carriers.

wifi.note: Limited free access available, upgrade options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves international flights and offers duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
